WorkItem.Description:
When converting a Word document to HTML. text in a paragraph is being split up into separate textruns when it should just be one textrun.

E.g.

Here is some paragraph content. Bloomin' 'eck ah'll gi' thee a thick ear how much. God's own county ah'll gi' thee a thick ear shu' thi gob tintintin. Will 'e 'eckerslike sup wi' 'im bobbar gerritetten. Cack-handed nobbut a lad soft lad tha knows tha what. Shurrup be reet nobbut a lad eeh shurrup aye. Michael palin dahn t'coil oil ah'll gi' thee a thick 

Becomes

Here is some paragraph content.

Bloomin

' '

eck

ah'll

gi

' thee a thick ear how much. God's own county

ah'll

gi

' thee a thick ear

shu

'

thi

gob

tintintin

. Will 'e '

eckerslike

sup

wi

' '

im

bobbar

gerritetten

. Cack-handed

nobbut

a lad soft lad

tha

knows

tha

what.

Shurrup

be

reet

nobbut

a lad

eeh

shurrup

aye. Michael

palin

dahn

t'coil

oil

ah'll

gi

' thee a thick

Comments.Message:
Here is a pull request which fixes this issue:

https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPWord/pull/463
